experiences.title: Technical Solutions Consultant (Compute, Industry Standard Servers)
experiences.subtitle: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
workDescription: Worked in the **Technical Break‐fix team** for Proliant Servers, with **B2B customers** from Fortune 500 customers to Medium Scale Businesses

Primary responsibilities: **Diagnosing and troubleshooting critical errors** in Servers, Blades and Converged Infrastructure, **performing Root‐cause Analysis**, and enabling on‐site engineers, IT and Datacentre technicians to implement my plan of action
Consistently maintained high (4 out of 4) quarterly Technical Competency Index rating throughout, with **Diagnostic accuracy** and **Customer satisfaction** above 90%

Drove operational KPIʼs and customer engagement within the team to improve **organisational efficiency and performance**, as a result of which was selected to spearhead a **Pilot Project** and to mentor new recruits

experiences.title: Founding Board member, Vice President, Public Relations
experiences.subtitle: SKY Campus Aachen e.V.
workDescription: Organized 20 + free events in Aachen with an attendance of 1500+ people from the student community, catering to Mental Health and wellbeing of the students during tough times
Publicised the club at Student-association club events and meetups, expanded the club outreach by 200%
Set-up an Intranet and Internal Repository to facilitate Information exchange

experiences.title: Marketing Lead
experiences.subtitle: Aachen Consulting Club e.V.
workDescription: Co-ordinated with speakers and presenters from Consulting firms like McKinsey, Bain & Co. to produce promotional material of club events, which helped students develop skills for a Consulting career
Formulated the Social Media strategy and automated the process of content posting
Designed the Branding material of the club, to be used on Digital and print formats

experiences.title: Google Student Ambassador
experiences.subtitle: Google
workDescription: Represented the team Google Sky at the Google Student Ambassador summit, won 1st position at the **Design Thinking competition**

Acted a **liaison between Google and the local developer community** to promote Google technologies and to develop technical skills, e.g. Application development in Android and Google Cloud Platform, and AdWords certification.
Headed a team of 5 members and organised independent and collaborative events. More than 5000 students participated in the events, and considered a career in the newly discovered fields.
